issues.shortMessage: Add a "default" clause to this "switch" statement.
issues.fullMessage: The requirement for a final "default/Case Else" clause is defensive programming. The clause should either take appropriate action, or contain a suitable comment as to why no action is taken. Even when the "switch/Select" covers all current values of an enumeration, a "default/Case Else" case should still be used because there is no guarantee that the enumeration won't be extended.

properties.title: "switch/Select" statements should end with a "default/Case Else" clause
